message: I'll give you 10% now, but be warned, I'll take more in future rounds!
Take a fair deal now, or risk losing more later!
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't make me wait!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving in yet!
You're running out of time, Bob. Don't make me go to 6!
You're getting closer to nothing, Alice, and I'm not getting any younger!
I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's time to split it down the middle, Alice. No more games!
